plays.text: Penalty to Alex Zhamnov 2 minutes for High Sticking Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Matt Bradley assisted by Bryan Marchment and Marco Sturm
Penalty to Niklas Sundstrom 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Tyler Arnason
Penalty to Vladimir Chebaturkin 2 minutes for Holding Adam Graves
Penalty to Mike Ricci 2 minutes for High Sticking Jaroslav Spacek
Penalty to Steve Poapst 2 minutes for Kneeing Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Eric Daze assisted by Michael Nylander
Goal scored by Owen Nolan assisted by Gary Suter and Vincent Damphousse
Penalty to Alexander Karpovtsev 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Steve Sullivan assisted by Tony Amonte and Eric Daze
